::Magmatron::

    He knew that they were ignoring him. It was time to make himself known. 
He flew in closer to the bridge (It is built like the Nemisis right?) and 
waved. He then flew to the Main Cannon of the ship. He charged up and blasted 
toward the powercells. Either way, his plan would work.
